Package com.penthera.virtuososdk

Class Common.SettingFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.Common.SettingFlag
  • Enclosing class:
    Common
    public static final class Common.SettingFlag
extends Object
    Flags for determining which settings have been modified in the Observers.IEngineObserver.settingChanged(int) callback.

      • SETTING_MAX_STORAGE

        public static final int SETTING_MAX_STORAGE
        value = 0x1; Flag for the Max Storage setting. Passed to the settingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when its value has been modified. Clients can modify the Max Storage setting through ISettings
        See Also:
        ISettings.setMaxStorageAllowed(long), Observers.IEngineObserver.settingChanged(int), Constant Field Values

      • SETTING_PROGRESS_UPDATE_PERCENT

        public static final int SETTING_PROGRESS_UPDATE_PERCENT
        value = 0x100; Flag for the progress update frequency based on percent. Passed to the settingChanged callback of IEngineObserver when its value has been modified. Clients can modify the frequency of progress updates through the settings interface.
